item.title: Compiler error
item.dc:creator: @bigballers bigballers
item.description:
@bigballers wrote:

client.java:20853: 'else' without 'if' else (c.thingy = 1) ^ client.java:20853: not a statement else (c.thingy = 1) ^ client.java:20853: ';' expected else (c.thingy = 1) ^

What im trying to do is get a minigame called: thingy to work and im trying to click on this thing so it checks if you got enuf points and if you dont it says fuck you…

And i want it to read so if it has c.thingy = 1 {
sendMessage(“fuck you”);
break;
}
}[br][br][size=1]Posted on: August 21, 2009, 10:32:51 am[/size][hr]HELP SOME1!!! i just want the Else without if GONE!!!1

Read full topic

item.title: Compiler error
item.dc:creator: @bigballers bigballers
item.description:
@bigballers wrote:

this may be a noob thing but i really dont know what to do:

client.java:20853: 'else' without 'if' else if (c.thing = 1) ^ 1 error

AND YES THERE IS A IF THERE!

Full code:

	case XXXXX:
                client c = (client) server.playerHandler.players[p];
if (c.thing = 2) {
	addItem(Item2.randomthing(), 1);
	sendMessage("Congratulations for finishing thing!");
                    teleportToX = XXXX;
                    teleportToY = YYYY;
}
                client c = (client) server.playerHandler.players[p];
else if (c.thing = 1)
{
sendMessage("Go fuck yourself!");
break;
}
}

Read full topic
